item.description:
Dear Members,

Be on the lookout for a warm-weather improv extravaganza as we kick off our rehearsal with some high energy improv kicks! A focus of our rehearsal will be on the technical form of the standard improv scene. In other words, we'll talk about the notes a good improv scene will hit rather than miss that lead to "funny." We will also watch a few video clips of improv in action, so we can see what good improv looks like!

As always, contact me with any questions or comments. See you next week!

Best,
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Open Rehearsal - Ensemble B Casting Call 5
